alert.note: Alert for Baker; Brooks; Colquitt; Early; Grady; Lowndes; Miller; Mitchell; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued April 13 at 11:42AM EDT until April 13 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 133 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA JEFFERSON MADISON TAYLOR IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BROOKS COLQUITT LOWNDES THOMAS IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER EARLY GRADY MILLER MITCHELL THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ADAMS BEACH, ALMA, ATHENA, BABCOCK, BEACHTON, BELLVIEW, BLAKELY, BLUE SPRINGS, BLUE SPRINGS, BOYD, BOYKIN, BRANCHVILLE, BROOKS CO A/P, BUCELL JUNCTION, CABBAGE GROVE, CAIRO, CAMILLA, CAPEL, CAPPS, CARBUR, CASA BLANCO, CENTERVILLE, CHERRY LAKE, COLQUITT, COOKTOWN, COTTON, CUBA, DILLON, DILLS, DIXIE, DOUGLASVILLE, DRIFTON, EARLY CO A/P, ELMODEL WMA, ELPINO, EMPRESS, ENTERPRISE, FESTUS, GRADY CO A/P, GROOVERVILLE, HANSON, HAWKINSTOWN, HOGGARD MILL, HOPEWELL, IVEYS MILL, JARROTT, LOVETT, MADISON, MAYHAW, METCALF, MILFORD, MITCHELL CO A/P, MONCRIEF, MONTICELLO, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NANKIN, NEWTON, PASCO, PELHAM, PERRY, PINE PARK, PINETTA, QUITMAN, RED STORE CROSSROADS, SPENCE AIRPORT, THOMASVILLE, VALDOSTA, AND VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT.
